name: ajo-ai-backend
description: Backend server for Ajo AI Technologies Scribe

scripts.reinstall: npm cache clean --force && rimraf ./node_modules ./package-lock.json && npm install
scripts.postinstall:
node -e "try { require.resolve('@google/genai') } catch(e) { console.error('

\x1b[31m--- CRITICAL POST-INSTALL ERROR ---\x1b[0m
\x1b[33mThe '@google/genai' package failed to install correctly.
Please try cleaning the cache and reinstalling with the special command:\x1b[0m

  \x1b[32mnpm run reinstall\x1b[0m

'); process.exit(1) }"
